judges: Before Bell, C. J., Jones, Cohen, Eagen and Alpern, JJ.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Pee Curiam,
Judgment affirmed on opinion of Judge Kelley of the court below.
Mr. Justice Eagen dissents.
opinions.author: Pee Curiam,

attorneys: Augustus Sigismondi, Assistant City Solicitor, with him James L. Stern, Deputy City Solicitor, Levy Anderson, First Deputy City Solicitor, and David Berger, City Solicitor, for City of Philadelphia, appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Simon, Appellant, v. Philadelphia.
Argued November 28, 1961.
Before Bell, C. J., Jones, Cohen, Eagen and Alpern, JJ.
reargument refused February 23, 1962.
Edward Unterberger, for appellant.
Augustus Sigismondi, Assistant City Solicitor, with him James L. Stern, Deputy City Solicitor, Levy Anderson, First Deputy City Solicitor, and David Berger, City Solicitor, for City of Philadelphia, appellee.
January 17, 1962:
